title:
KYBO 3.0.0
***Comedy***
Let's Be Cops (2014) http://144.76.186.45/r57/5/tyler/movie/LetsBeCopsDVD-TylerMovieLand.mp4 http://your-torrent.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/Lets_Be_Cops-00.jpg http://i.ytimg.com/vi/m_CT-gyivqA/maxresdefault.jpg Best pals Ryan (Jake Johnson) and Justin (Damon Wayans Jr.) are stalled in their respective careers -- a fact that is painfully driven home when they go to a college reunion. Dressed as police in the mistaken belief that they were to attend a costume party, Ryan and Justin find that the uniforms earn them much respect and attention. Although Justin is uncomfortable with the idea, Ryan decides to continue with the charade, putting them both in increasingly dangerous situations.
22 Jump Street (2014)
http://www.moviepilot.de/files/images/movie/file/11001159/22-Jump-Street-Poster.jpg http://filmonic.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/21-Jump-Street-movie.jpg After making their way through high school (twice), big changes are in store for officers Schmidt and Jenko when they go deep undercover at a local college.
Horrible Bosses 2 (2014) http://www.movshare.net/video/89c49604ca5f0 https://whatsontheredcarpet.files.wordpress.com/2015/02/horrible-bosses-2-movie-poster.jpg https://s.yimg.com/os/publish-images/movies/2014-11-03/337b9f00-63a9-11e4-871e-1b62bfda1b3c_horrible-bosses-2.jpg Dale, Kurt and Nick decide to start their own business but things don't go as planned because of a slick investor, prompting the trio to pull off a harebrained and misguided kidnapping scheme.
Dumb and Dumber To (2014)
http://blogs-images.forbes.com/scottmendelson/files/2014/11/142vio1111111.jpg http://www.cinemablend.com/images/news_img/40348/Dumb_and_Dumber_To_40348.jpg 20 years since their first adventure, Lloyd and Harry go on a road trip to find Harry's newly discovered daughter, who was given up for adoption.
The Interview (2014)
http://i.jeded.com/i/the-interview-2014.31431.jpg http://netflixlife.com/files/2015/01/interview1-820x420.jpg Dave Skylark and producer Aaron Rapoport run the celebrity tabloid show "Skylark Tonight." When they land an interview with a surprise fan, North Korean dictator Kim Jong-un, they are recruited by the CIA to turn their trip to Pyongyang into an assassination mission.
Knights of Badassdom (2013)
http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ3ODEwMzY3NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTkwMTQ5MDE@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://seveninchesofyourtime.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/04/kob5.jpg Live-action role players conjure up a demon from Hell by mistake and they must deal with the consequences.
The Heat (2013)
http://www.film1.nl/images/portrait/original/88644.jpg https://abbiewatchesstuff.files.wordpress.com/2013/08/the-heat1.jpg An uptight FBI Special Agent is paired with a foul-mouthed Boston cop to take down a ruthless drug lord.
We're the Millers (2013)
http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/4/44/We're_the_Millers_poster.jpg http://images.entertainment.ie/images_content/rectangle/620x372/WereTheMillersREDBAND.jpg A veteran pot dealer creates a fake family as part of his plan to move a huge shipment of weed into the U.S. from Mexico.
The World's End (2013)
http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BNzA1MTk1MzY0OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjkzNTUwMDE@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://www.flixist.com/ul/215697-the-worlds-end-simon-pegg-edgar-wright-nick-frost.jpg Five friends who reunite in an attempt to top their epic pub crawl from 20 years earlier unwittingly become humankind's only hope for survival.
Red 2 (2013)
http://images.mymovies.net/images/film/cin/350x522/fid12807.jpg http://actionflickchick.com/superaction/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/Red-2-Can-you-shoot.jpg Retired C.I.A. agent Frank Moses reunites his unlikely team of elite operatives for a global quest to track down a missing portable nuclear device.
The Internship (2013)
http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/e/ed/The-internship-poster.jpg http://movieripped.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/12/TheInternship_thumbLG.jpg Two salesmen whose careers have been torpedoed by the digital age find their way into a coveted internship at Google, where they must compete with a group of young, tech-savvy geniuses for a shot at employment.
21 Jump Street (2012)
http://www.spacemov.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/07/21-Jump-Street.jpg http://bestmoviesevernews.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/02/Channing-Tatum-and-Jonah-Hill-in-21-Jump-Street-2012-Movie-Image1.jpg A pair of underachieving cops are sent back to a local high school to blend in and bring down a synthetic drug ring.
The Watch (2012)
http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMjU5MzI1NTk1MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzk5NzY5Nw@@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://wp.production.patheos.com/blogs/tinseltalk/files/2012/07/The-Watch-01.jpg Four men who form a neighborhood watch group as a way to get out of their day-to-day family routines find themselves defending the Earth from an alien invasion.
Ted (2012)
http://www.freemovieposters.net/posters/ted_2012_5795_poster.jpg http://queenofthenerds.net/wp-content/uploads/2012/07/Seth-MacFarlane-Ted.jpg As the result of a childhood wish, John Bennett's teddy bear, Ted, came to life and has been by John's side ever since - a friendship that's tested when Lori, John's girlfriend of four years, wants more from their relationship.
Project X (2012)
http://www.hdfilmbox.net/uploads/film/2015/01/project-x-turkce-altyazili-347.jpg http://themoviemash.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/12/project_x_movie_still.jpg 3 high school seniors throw a birthday party to make a name for themselves. As the night progresses, things spiral out of control as word of the party spreads.
Paul (2011)
http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/9/96/Paul_poster.jpg http://www.thatfilmguy.net/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/Paul1.jpg Two British comic-book geeks traveling across the U.S. encounter an alien outside Area 51.
The Other Guys (2010)
http://content7.flixster.com/movie/11/16/94/11169445_800.jpg http://www.themoviebanter.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/08/2010_the_other_guys_002.jpg Two mismatched New York City detectives seize an opportunity to step up like the city's top cops whom they idolize -- only things don't quite go as planned.
Hot Tub Time Machine (2010)
http://www.heyuguys.com/images/2010/04/Hot_Tub_1sheet_lo.jpg http://www.kijkbaar.nl/wp-content/uploads/2014/12/hot-tub-time-machine-2-trailer-2-small.jpg A malfunctioning time machine at a ski resort takes a man back to 1986 with his two friends and nephew, where they must relive a fateful night and not change anything to make sure the nephew is born.
Shaun of the Dead (2004)
http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMTU2NjA0NDk0NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTA0OTQzMw@@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://adventureamigos.net/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/Shaun-Of-The-Dead-First.jpg A man decides to turn his moribund life around by winning back his ex-girlfriend, reconciling his relationship with his mother, and dealing with an entire community that has returned from the dead to eat the living.
Human Traffic (1999)
http://static.cinemagia.ro/img/db/movie/00/23/90/human-traffic-356942l.jpg http://img.bluray-disc.de/files/review/big__human-traffic-review-004.jpg Five friends spend one lost weekend in a mix of music, love and club culture.
